title: Command Blocker blocked commands schema
description: JSON Schema for Command Blocker blocked commands

args.description: The command arguments to be blocked.

regex.description: The command regex to be blocked.

permission.description: The permission required to execute the command without being blocked.

messages.description: The message(s) sent to the player when the command is blocked.

worlds.description: The worlds (or servers if on a proxy) that the command is blocked in.

playerCommands.description: The commands that are executed by the player when the command is blocked.

consoleCommands.description: The commands that are executed by the console when the command is blocked.
examples: say %p tried to access a blocked command

title.description: The main title sent to the player when the command is blocked.

subtitle.description: The subtitle sent to the player when the command is blocked.

fadeIn.description: The fade in time for the title sent to the player when the command is blocked.

stay.description: The stay time for the title sent to the player when the command is blocked.

fadeOut.description: The fade out time for the title sent to the player when the command is blocked.

actionBar.description: The action bar sent to the player when the command is blocked.

disableTabCompletion.description: Disables all tab completion for the command, if supported.

whitelistedPlayers.description: Commands allowed for specified UUIDs, instead of allowing by permission.

blockedCommands.description: The blocked commands for regular players.
